Package presentation

Class UiManager

java.lang.Object
presentation.UiManager
public class UiManager extends Object
This class is for printing data and receiving data from the console.

    • getStringInput

      public String getStringInput()
      Method to receive from the user the whole line inputted.
      Returns:
      The whole input received from the user as a String.

    • getIntInput

      public int getIntInput()
      Method to receive the inputted data transformed into an integer.
      Returns:
      The input data as an int. In case of a numberFormatException it returns -1.

    • printStats

      public void printStats(String characterName, int[] randomValues, int[] stats, int level)
      Method to print the generation of the stats and the stats.
      Parameters:
      characterName - a string containing the character's CharacterGame name.
      randomValues - an array of integers containing the values obtained after throwing the dices.
      stats - an array of integers containing the character's CharacterGame stats values.
      level - an integer containing the character's CharacterGame level.

      Method to ask for a character's class.

      Method to print the class has been sucessfully selected and the character has been created.
      Parameters:
      characterName - name of the character
      className - class of the character

    • askFilter

      public void askFilter()
      Method to ask for a character's CharacterGame player name to show its characters.

    • listAdventurers

      public void listAdventurers(String input, List<CharacterGame> adventurers)
      Method to print a list of the characters CharacterGame that have a player in common. And ask for one to meet.
      Parameters:
      input - a string containing the player name.
      adventurers - list containing all the characters CharacterGame instances to be listed.

    • listCharacters

      public void listCharacters(List<CharacterGame> characters)
      Method to list a set of characters.
      Parameters:
      characters - list containing all the characters CharacterGame instances to be listed.

    • printCharacter

      public void printCharacter(CharacterGame character, int level)
      Method to print all the information about a character CharacterGame.
      Parameters:
      character - a character object CharacterGame containing the character whose information is to be printed.
      level - an integer containing the level of the character CharacterGame to be printed.

    • askDeleteCharacter

      public void askDeleteCharacter(String characterName)
      Method to ask for the name of the character CharacterGame to be deleted as confirmation before doing so.
      Parameters:
      characterName - a string containing the name of the character CharacterGame to be deleted.

    • printDeleteCharacter

      Method to print the deletion message after a character CharacterGame has been deleted.
      Parameters:
      characterName - a string with the name of the deleted character CharacterGame.

      public void encounterCreationQuote(int numEncounters)
      Method to print the number of encounters quote.
      Parameters:
      numEncounters - an integer containing the number of encounters of an adventure Adventure.

    • askEncounterOptions

      public void askEncounterOptions(int numEncounters, int currEncounter, int numMonsters, List<String> monsters, List<Integer> amount)
      Method to show the encounter Encounter creation menu and ask for an option.
      Parameters:
      numEncounters - an integer containing the adventure Adventure number of encounters.
      currEncounter - an integer containing the current encounter number.
      numMonsters - an integer containing the number of different types of monster Monster.
      monsters - a string list containing the different types of monsters in the encounter Encounter.
      amount - an integer list containing the amounts of monster of each type in the encounter Encounter.

    • listMonsters

      public void listMonsters(List<Monster> monsters)
      Method to list all the possible monster types and ask for one to choose.
      Parameters:
      monsters - a list of all the different types of monsters(monster names) Monster.

    • askMonsterAmount

      public void askMonsterAmount(String monsterName)
      Method to ask for the amount of the monsters of the type of monster selected.
      Parameters:
      monsterName - a string containing the monster type(monster names) Monster selected before.

    • askMonsterToDelete

      public void askMonsterToDelete()
      Method to ask for a monster Monster to be deleted from the encounter Encounter.

    • printMonsterDeleted

      public void printMonsterDeleted(String monsterName, int amount)
      Method to print the monsters deleted.
      Parameters:
      monsterName - a string containing the monster type(monster names) Monster of the monsters deleted.
      amount - the number of the monsters of that type that were deleted.

    • listAdventures

      public void listAdventures(List<Adventure> adventures)
      Method to list all the adventures available.
      Parameters:
      adventures - a list of adventure (monster names) Adventure instances containing all the adventures in the system.

    • printPartySize

      public void printPartySize(int partySize)
      Method to print the party size quote and an introduction quote before showing all the available charactersCharacterGame.
      Parameters:
      partySize - and integer containing the party size.

    • askMemberToJoin

      public void askMemberToJoin(int partySize, List<CharacterGame> characters, List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method to print your party members, all the available charactersCharacterGame and ask for a character to join the party.
      Parameters:
      partySize - an integer with the party size.
      characters - a list of characters CharacterGame instances containing all the characters available.
      party - a list of characters CharacterGame instances containing all the characters in the party.

    • startAdventure

      public void startAdventure(List<CharacterGame> party, String adventureName)
      Method to print your party members and the initialization of the adventure.
      Parameters:
      party - a list of characters CharacterGame instances containing all the characters in the party.
      adventureName - a string containing the name of the adventure Adventure to be started.

    • encounterInitialization

      public void encounterInitialization(Encounter encounter, int currEncounter)
      Method to print the initialization of an encounterEncounter.
      Parameters:
      encounter - an encounterEncounter object containing the encounter to be started.
      currEncounter - an integer containing the number of the current encounter.

    • printPreparationStage

      public void printPreparationStage(String logActions, String logInitiative)
      Method to print the preparation stage actions and the initiative order.
      Parameters:
      logActions - a string containing all the actions performed by the party characters during the preparation stage.
      logInitiative - a string containing the initiative order.

    • printCombatStage

      public void printCombatStage(String log)
      Method to print all the actions performed by the party membersCharacterGame and the monstersMonster of an encounterEncounter.
      Parameters:
      log - a string containing all the actions performed during the stage by either monsters Monster or charactersCharacterGame.

    • printRestStage

      public void printRestStage(String log)
      Method to print the rest stage actions and the experienced gained by the party membersCharacterGame.
      Parameters:
      log - a string containing the actions performed during this stage and the experience gained.
